oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ralph Emery On The Record with Vince Gill - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Multple recordings from Ralph Emery's (entertainer) interview of Vince Gill (performer) for Ralph Emery: On the Record With Vince Gill. Recording is performed in front of a live audience. Interview features a segment featuring Jerene Gill (personality). Recording is from May 31, 1994. Tape is labeled part 2, and opening segments of the show with Jerene Gill.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ralph Emery; Vince Gill
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:11) Ralph Emery inquires whether or not Vince Gill had ever given away a guitar; plus, Vince reflects on receiving the Country Music Association's Entertainer of the Year Award -- (02:22) Emery praises Vince's charitable contributions -- (03:25) Emery plays a clip where Vince wins the Minnie Pearl Award -- (05:34) Emery invites Vince to discuss how Vince and Jenny joke about each other in their songs -- (07:30) Emery plays a clip where Vince is awarded the Country Music Association's Entertainer of the Year Award -- (09:14) Emery expresses his thanks to Gill and both say goodbye -- (10:40) Jerene Gill radio spot for Ralph Emery's On the Record -- (11:01) Emery greets the crowd and introduces Vince Gill -- (1206) Emery introduces Jerene -- (12:42) Emery presents Vince with a bottle of Tarn X and asks Vince about its significance -- (13:35) Emery asks Jerene to tell a story about how Gill would walk up to people as a child to make a proclamation -- (15:17) Emery inquires about Jerene's maternal instincts when it came to football; additionally, Emery presents a number of photos of Vince -- (16:51) Emery jokes about Gill's golf career; additionally, Emery expresses his thanks for Jerene Gill
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Emery, Ralph; Gill, Vince;
